sentences.en: Advancing suburban assurance is the difficulty and keystone of domestic insurance enterprise.
sentences.cn: 发展农村保险是我国保险业发展的难点和重点.

sentences.en: Close beneath was the suburban residence of the Junior Pani.
sentences.cn: 紧挨着下面,便是偏妃的郊外别墅.

sentences.en: Far away were indications of suburban towns, some big smoke - stacks towering high in the air.
sentences.cn: 远远的地方,有城郊市镇的影子, 有许多高耸入云的大烟囱.

sentences.en: His clothes are conservative and suburban.
It was suggested that we open a suburban automat.
sentences.cn: 有人建议我们开一家郊区自助食堂.

sentences.en: It'sets down in the midst of quiet suburban homes.
sentences.cn: 它坐落在安静的郊外住宅区的中间.

sentences.en: Its route seemed interminable, through the low, brick, suburban, populous va stness.
sentences.cn: 路程好象是漫无尽头似的, 沿途经过了不少住得拥挤不堪的郊区砖砌矮房子.

sentences.en: Our next two meetings were held at the Northfield Hilton in suburban Detroit.
sentences.cn: 我们以后的两次会面是在底特律郊区的北菲尔德的希尔顿.

sentences.en: School crime and violence cuts across urban, rural and suburban areas.
sentences.cn: 城市、乡村和郊区都出现了校园犯罪和校园暴力现象。

sentences.en: Self - reliance is sneered at as an absurd suburban pretension.
sentences.cn: 依靠自己被讥笑为一种荒唐的偏狭的见解.

sentences.en: The suburban areas usually have railroad or bus transportation to neighboring towns.
sentences.cn: 郊区通常都有铁路或公共汽车达邻近的城镇.

sentences.en: There's a lot of good things about suburban living.
sentences.cn: 郊区生活是有许多优点.

sentences.en: They decide to head for a suburban shopping mall.
sentences.cn: 于是他们决定前往郊区的购物中心.
他们住在华盛顿的郊外.

trans.tran_cn: 城郊的，在郊区的，城郊住宅区的，土气的，见闻不广的
trans.tran_en: related to a suburb, or in a suburb
